briefTitle: Telemedicine Interventions for Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Physician diagnosis of sleep apnea
* Apnea-hypopnea index \>10/hr
* BMI over 24 kg/m2

Exclusion Criteria:

* Angina pectoris
* History of myocardial infarction within 6 months

outcomeMeasures.title: Change Over 6 Months in Epworth Sleepiness Scale Score
outcomeMeasures.description: Epworth Sleepiness Scale score, change in score from baseline to 6 months. Total scores range from 0-24, where higher scores indicate more sleepiness.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change Over 6 Months in Quality of Life
outcomeMeasures.description: Quality of life as assessed by the Functional Outcomes of Sleep Questionnaire, change from baseline to 6 months. The potential range of scores for the Functional Outcomes of Sleep total score is 5-20 where higher scores indicate better quality of life. The total score is the sum of the 5 subscale scores (general productivity, social outcome, activity level, vigilance, intimate relationships), which are weighted means ranging from 1-4.
